doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 32 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 149[Air Date: 5/7/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 32 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 149[Air Date: 5/7/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Richmond Virginia hearings on gay rights2. Man stabs and kills homosexual, claims self defense, 2nd degree murder3. New South Wales, Australian Chief Medical Officer, seeks to close all bathhouses in the nation, believes it is a "breeding ground for AIDS"COMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals4. Interview with Sue Li Bow, Director of Development for the Lesbian Rights Project, discusses family law and lesbian gay rights5. Interview with Albuquerque's Common Bond president, Anne Doughty, discusses community centerCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper6. Coming outCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"7. Sports including clipHealthline: Conversations with GMHC: Gary MacDonald, Executive Director of the Federation of AIDS Related Organizations, discusses his organization8. Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media reports/current events/culture, includes Lawrence of Arabia clip and CNN news report on Gays and TVCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine2. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity3. Return to Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: Arco Blancos resort, San Juan, Puerto Rico4. Commercials with SybilCOMMERCIAL: World of Video5. Dr. Jim Serafini, Psychotherapist, discusses gay relationships, romance versus friendship
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 32 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 149[Air Date: 5/7/1985]: May 1985
